content.content: Patient is here for low back pain, 2 out of 10. Patient reports getting on a small ladder about 3 feet tall when she fell on her back 1 week ago August 11. Patient denies hitting her head or any loss of consciousness. Patient comes in today with her granddaughter due to her ongoing pain. Med list does show that she is on Celebrex but patient is unsure if she is taking it. Patient does note that she takes 2 Tylenol pills OTC. Patient describes pain in the lower back near her buttocks.
Constitutional: General Appearance: healthy-appearing, normal body habitus, and no acute distress.
Psychiatric: Mood and Affect: active and alert.
Gait and Station: Gait And Stance normal stance.
Lumbar Spine: Bony Palpation of the Lumbar Spine: tenderness of the sacrum .
